model-description: Reliable all-rounder, balanced speed & quality
Long-context expert, precise instruction following
Strong everyday reasoning, cost-efficient
Deeper reasoning, complex tasks mastery
True multimodal powerhouse, broad reasoning
Extracts analyst statements from earnings call transcripts and categorizes them (Revenue, M&A, Product Portfolio, COGS, Management & Organization, SG&A, Capital Returns, CapEx, Macro).
Analyzes recent earnings/investor call Q&A across selected companies, surfaces cross-company themes, and outputs concise analytics tables for executives/boards.
Generates and distributes relevant analyst themes to vertical/functional leaders to guide client activation.
Agent specialized in identifying companies.

ESG insights and analyses across six dimensions: Materiality; KPIs and targets; ESG performance and benchmarking; Disclosures, ratings, awards, and memberships; ESG value generation; Operating model / org design.
Monitors real-time news and corporate events (activism, executive changes, earnings, M&A, IPOs, reorganizations, product launches, and more) for timely, actionable insights.
Unified flagship, advanced safe reasoning.
Uses org data, financial data, and basic company financials to evaluate strategic positioning.
Orchestrator of aggregator agents to run industry-level analyses.
Orchestrator of aggregator agents to run industry-level analyses.
Generates downloadable reports from company lists and financial metrics using MVIP Data Download capabilities.
Financial Value at Stake (VaS) model to estimate potential upside from specific levers backed by anecdotal evidence.
Excel builder for the MVI VaS model, used for deep research.
Access to full company transcripts (earnings, guidance, analyst days, M&A, etc.) and SEC filings for deep research and due diligence.
Provides company transcripts across multiple event types and access to filings for financial analysis and due diligence.
Outside-in value creation agent for industry.
Outside-in value creation agent for banks.
Searches, retrieves, and summarizes information from the internet in real time; ideal for research and fact-checking.
